docs.lead_paragraph: Nothing sparks consumer demand like the word "free," and politicians in some states have proposed the idea of providing that incentive to get young people to attend community college.

headline.main: States Looking at $0 Community College Tuition
headline.print_headline: States Looking at $0 Community College Tuition

docs.snippet: Nothing sparks consumer demand like the word "free," and politicians in some states have proposed the idea of providing that incentive to get young people to attend community college.
